2105600.name: RPG Stories
2105600.description:
Welcome to RPG Stories, where your creativity knows no bounds!

This is the main version of RPG Stories VTT featuring the full version of the World-Builder and the ability to Host or Join Games.

About RPG Stories VTT

Our 3D World Builder lets you quickly and easily create indoor and outdoor environments for all types of tabletop role-playing games—whether Fantasy, Modern, or Sci-Fi.

Once your map is complete, you have two options:

  • Export your maps for use in other VTTs.

  • Play online in RPG Stories VTT with a fully 3D environment and stable multiplayer mode.

Craft stunning worlds, design engaging maps, and embark on unforgettable adventures—all with ease and flexibility!

BUILD WITHOUT LIMITS

-Use auto-building for quick setups or take full control with manual customization—perfect for any skill level.

-Choose from over 7,000 3D models spanning Fantasy, Modern, and Sci-Fi settings, giving you everything you need to bring your worlds to life.

-Discover hundreds of ready-to-use creations from other users in our Steam Workshop.

  • Procedurally Generated Scenes

  • Auto-Room Builder

  • Mass Placement Tool

  • Multi-Level Building

  • Group Objects & Steam Workshop support

  • Ready Buildings

  • Modular Pieces for Custom Builds

  • 3D Characters & Monsters

  • VFX

  • 2D Images Upload

  • Customizable Grid

PLAY LIKE NEVER BEFORE

RPG Stories VTT lets you play on your maps online with stable multiplayer support.

Current Features:

  • Online World-Builder – Move objects or add new ones in real time, enhancing immersion and maintaining full control over the environment.

  • Vast 3D Dice Panel – Roll any dice set from any TTRPG you can imagine.

  • GM Controls – Customize player experience, movement, and spawn points.

  • 3D Characters – Players can walk around as fully animated 3D models.

  • Hero Forge API – Use your Hero Forge minis as 3D tokens.

-RPG Stories VTT users can host as GMs or join as players.

-Unlock unlimited player slots with the Unlock Player Seats DLC, allowing players with the free demo to join your games for life

EXPORTS & OTHER VTTS

  • 2D Export: Capture stunning screenshots from any camera angle—top view, isometric view, or more—up to 8K resolution.

  • Video: Record your screen while moving the camera to create cinematic videos of your scenes.

  • RPGs Export: Export your maps and environments as a special RPG Stories file to share online or upload directly to the Steam Workshop with a single click.

  • RPGe Export: Combine objects to create custom items and share them with others, or upload them to the Steam Workshop for everyone to enjoy.

  • Other VTTs Export: RPG Stories World-Builder allows you export your maps to other VTTs, including all the necessary data for Dynamic Lighting. The VTT Exporter tool uses the Universal VTT (UVTT) file format, compatible with all major VTT platforms.

DYNAMIC VTT TOOLS & FEATURES

RPG Stories VTT offers Game Master-friendly features that enhance both gameplay and world-building, allowing you to elevate theatricality in every session.

  • Quest Writing: Forget third-party text pads—keep everything in your Journal and add Quest Notes directly to your 3D scene.

  • Fog of War: Hide certain areas from your players or lock the camera to their 3D character’s perspective.

  • Tab System: Divide your adventure into different environmental tabs and set spawn points for your players in each.

  • Weather System: Set and change the weather as you play by choosing from 35+ weather conditions, sky types, and auroras.

  • Light Sources: Add light sources and use the full day-night cycle by adjusting the sun in your 3D scene.

  • Camera Movement: Move the camera freely with your mouse or keyboard, switch to Top or Isometric View, or customize the players’ view to see exactly what you want them to.

  • 2D Support: Import 2D images or maps and play in 2D.

  • VFX: Add VFX to your scenes or use them as spells during gameplay.

  • Underwater Settings: Instantly transform your 3D scene into an underwater world with one click.

FOR THE COMMUNITY

Brave Alice Games and the RPG Stories team put the community first.

  • RPG Stories VTT’s exports are 100% commercial-free—yes, you can even sell your maps and scenes.

  • Join our active Discord community to share feedback, connect with other players, and help shape the future of RPG Stories.
